short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Moist Meter ratings to your favorite media sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the most coveted movie and media reviews: the Moist Meter. 

This unofficial Moist Meter extension adds reviewer MoistCr1TiKaL, also known as penguinz0's Moist Meter ratings on Google, Rotten Tomatoes, and IMDB. 

Features:

- Show Moist Meter ratings

The unofficial Moist Meter extension shows Moist Meter ratings of all movies and TV shows Charlie has reviewed on on Google cards, Rotten Tomatoes, Letterboxd, and IMDB.

- View MoistCr1TiKaL's reviews

With the Moist Meter extension, clicking on the rating will direct you to a custom analysis page that shows a summarized review from Charlie's Moist Meter video, along with links to watch the original Moist Meter.
